title: Reclaim Your Heart: Personal Insights on Breaking Free from Life's Shackles
description: Many of us live our lives entrapped by the same repeated patterns of heartbreak and disappointment. Often, we have no idea why this happens. Reclam Your Heart is about freeing the heart from this slavery. It is about the journey in and out of life's most deceptive traps.
author: Yasmin Mogahed
